parameters: Welcome to the first outpost! What do you want to know?
An outpost acts like a "breathing point" for the agency's adventurers.
You have reached the first of the many. Who knows if you'll reach the other ones.

Well, of course it is not voluntary. I was an adventurer like you, but that was a long ago. I'd rather be here than to dig deeper in this dungeon. I don't want to die, but I want to help... so here we are.
I can save your adventure if you like.
It is well appreaciated if you will not make trouble. We're already troubled here, you know. All of us.
Guarding this thing isn't really easy. Good thing we've got Garith to clear out the monsters here, before they even reconstitute.
The anvil is right there. Just do your things, whatever.
Even in this darkness, we shall never forget our faith. God will deliver us from this wretched hell!
How are you doin'. I'm Garith. How about you?
Man, those holy priests are something.
Hello, adventurer. I am Valys, one of the battle priests that guards this chapel.
Should the Head Priest ever have a vision regarding a holy request, I'll be the one to relay it to you.
In the name of the God beyond this abyss, I will protect this place.
Ever since [The Void Arrival] happened, the [Lupus Rex] appointed his church to lead.
People were divided in accordance to their capabilities, in which they strive to be of help for everyone in each settlement.
There were [Champions], those who can decimate the very being of the monsters. They are commonly stationed to a settlement to lead the [Guardians].
There were [Battle Priests]. They are par with the champion's strength, but chosen to serve the Holy [Head Priest].
There are [Adventurers], who are assigned to explore the [Void], and search for artifacts, heathens, and a way out.
This profession isn't commonly selected due to the severe danger that this profession entails. Mostly, people that are qualified to be one chooses to be a guardian.
Lastly, there are the commoners, who are not able to fight, but can offer support services such as shopkeeping, armor and weapon crafting, etc.
